answerCode.java: import java.util.*; public class Main{ public static void main(String[]args){ Scanner sc=new Scanner(System.in); int a=sc.nextInt(),b=sc.nextInt(); System.out.print(a+b);} }
import java.util.*; public class Main{ public static void main(String[]args){ Scanner sc=new Scanner(System.in); int a=sc.nextInt(),b=sc.nextInt(); System.out.print(a%b);} }
import java.util.*; public class Main{ public static void main(String[]args){ Scanner sc=new Scanner(System.in); double a=sc.nextDouble(),b=sc.nextDouble(); System.out.print(a+b);} }
import java.util.*; public class Main{ public static void main(String[]a){ Scanner sc=new Scanner(System.in); int n=sc.nextInt(); System.out.print(++n);} }
import java.util.*; public class Main{ public static void main(String[]a){ Scanner sc=new Scanner(System.in); int n=sc.nextInt(); System.out.print(--n);} }
import java.util.*; public class Main{ public static void main(String[]a){ Scanner sc=new Scanner(System.in); int x=sc.nextInt(),y=sc.nextInt(); System.out.print(3*(x-y)); } }
import java.util.*; public class Main{ public static void main(String[]a){ Scanner sc=new Scanner(System.in); String s=sc.next(); int n=sc.nextInt(); System.out.print(s+n); } }

problems.description: è¼¸å…¥ a, bï¼Œè‹¥ a>b å° trueã€‚

answerCode.java: import java.util.*; public class Main{ public static void main(String[]a){ Scanner sc=new Scanner(System.in); int x=sc.nextInt(),y=sc.nextInt(); System.out.print(x>y); } }
import java.util.*; public class Main{ public static void main(String[]a){ Scanner sc=new Scanner(System.in); int x=sc.nextInt(),y=sc.nextInt(); System.out.print(x!=y); } }
import java.util.*; public class Main{ public static void main(String[]a){ Scanner sc=new Scanner(System.in); boolean v=sc.nextBoolean(); System.out.print(!v);} }
import java.util.*; public class Main{ public static void main(String[]a){ Scanner sc=new Scanner(System.in); int x=sc.nextInt(); double y=sc.nextDouble(); System.out.print(x*y + y);} }
import java.util.*; public class Main{ public static void main(String[]a){ Scanner sc=new Scanner(System.in); int n=sc.nextInt(),x=sc.nextInt(); n+=x; System.out.print(n);} }
import java.util.*; public class Main{ public static void main(String[]a){ Scanner sc=new Scanner(System.in); int n=sc.nextInt(),k=sc.nextInt(); n*=k; System.out.print(n);} }
import java.util.*; public class Main{ public static void main(String[]a){ Scanner sc=new Scanner(System.in); int x=sc.nextInt(),y=sc.nextInt(); System.out.print(x>0 && y>0);} }

problems.title: é‚è¼¯æˆ–é‹ç®—
problems.description: è¼¸å…¥ a, bï¼Œè‹¥ a==0 æˆ– b==0 å‰‡è¼¸å‡º trueã€‚

answerCode.java: import java.util.*; public class Main{ public static void main(String[]a){ Scanner sc=new Scanner(System.in); int x=sc.nextInt(),y=sc.nextInt(); System.out.print(x==0 || y==0);} }
import java.util.*; public class Main{ public static void main(String[]a){ Scanner sc=new Scanner(System.in); int x=sc.nextInt(),y=sc.nextInt(); System.out.print(x & y);} }
import java.util.*; public class Main{ public static void main(String[]a){ Scanner sc=new Scanner(System.in); int x=sc.nextInt(),y=sc.nextInt(); System.out.print(x | y);} }
import java.util.*; public class Main{ public static void main(String[]a){ Scanner sc=new Scanner(System.in); int x=sc.nextInt(),y=sc.nextInt(); System.out.print(x ^ y);} }
import java.util.*; public class Main{ public static void main(String[]a){ Scanner sc=new Scanner(System.in); int n=sc.nextInt(),k=sc.nextInt(); System.out.print(n<<k);} }
import java.util.*; public class Main{ public static void main(String[]a){ Scanner sc=new Scanner(System.in); int n=sc.nextInt(),k=sc.nextInt(); System.out.print(n>>k);} }
import java.util.*; public class Main{ public static void main(String[]a){ Scanner sc=new Scanner(System.in); int x=sc.nextInt(),y=sc.nextInt(); System.out.print(x*x - y*y + x*y);} }
import java.util.*; public class Main{ public static void main(String[]a){ Scanner sc=new Scanner(System.in); int x=sc.nextInt(),y=sc.nextInt(); System.out.print((x>=0 && y>=0)||(x<0 && y<0)); } }

problems.title: é›¶é™¤åˆ¤æ–·ï¼ˆä¸èƒ½ä½¿ç”¨ ifï¼‰
problems.description: è¼¸å…¥ a, bï¼Œè‹¥ b=0 å°å‡º 0ï¼Œå¦å‰‡è¼¸å‡º a/bã€‚ï¼ˆç”¨ä¸‰å…ƒé‹ç®—ï¼‰

answerCode.java: import java.util.*; public class Main{ public static void main(String[]a){ Scanner sc=new Scanner(System.in); int x=sc.nextInt(),y=sc.nextInt(); System.out.print(y==0?0:x/y);} }
import java.util.*; public class Main{ public static void main(String[]a){ Scanner sc=new Scanner(System.in); int n=sc.nextInt(); System.out.print(n>0?1:n<0?-1:0);} }
import java.util.*; public class Main{ public static void main(String[]a){ Scanner sc=new Scanner(System.in); int n=sc.nextInt(); System.out.print((n&1)==0?"Even":"Odd"); } }
import java.util.*; public class Main{ public static void main(String[]a){ Scanner sc=new Scanner(System.in); int n=sc.nextInt(); System.out.print((n<<1)+(n>>1)); } }
import java.util.*; public class Main{ public static void main(String[]a){ Scanner sc=new Scanner(System.in); int x=sc.nextInt(),y=sc.nextInt(),z=sc.nextInt(); System.out.print(x+y*z-(x%y)); } }
import java.util.*; public class Main{ public static void main(String[]a){ Scanner sc=new Scanner(System.in); int x=sc.nextInt(),y=sc.nextInt(); System.out.print(((x&y)!=0) || (x>y)); } }
import java.util.*; public class Main{ public static void main(String[]a){ Scanner sc=new Scanner(System.in); int n=sc.nextInt(); System.out.print(~n);} }

import java.util.*; public class Main{ public static void main(String[]x){ Scanner sc=new Scanner(System.in); int a=sc.nextInt(),b=sc.nextInt(),c=sc.nextInt(); System.out.print((a<<1)+(b>>1)+(a^c)-(b%a)); } }
